name: Bond Blues
description:
Christopher has started his new job as an assistant, others would say, an enforcer, for a bail bondsman in Burlington, Vermont. Does he take a gentler, or more forceful touch? When he begins to notice things beyond his pay grade, how does it play out?

  • Learn what a bail bondsman is
  • Small town intrigue
  • Fully voiced
  • Hand-drawn art
  • 12 emails
  • 29 music tracks

A visual novel made for the CasualCord Game Jam 2022 - After a year in development, hopefully it's been worth the wait.
